I've used Ultimate Traffic and TrafficX ... WOAI is way better than either, IMHO. It may be handy to have all these packages as one d/l (thanks, anon), but unless you happen to "fly" all over the world, I'd say just grabbing what you need for your local area/countries from WOAI may be a better option.

Don't forget .. you need to keep checking WOAI for updated packages!

"NOTE: to use these models and repaints with FSX you must de-activate the 'Aircafts cast shadows' function within FSX."

Not true ... only do this if using DX10 preview. I *did* have to do that with Ultimate Traffic though (grrrr).
